returns._0: True if target depositary is allowed.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

DepositaryAdded(address).notice: An event thats emitted when an new depositary added to agregate.

DepositaryRemoved(address).notice: An event thats emitted when an depositary removed from agregate.

PauserChanged(address).notice: An event thats emitted when an pauser address changed.

Rebalance().notice: An event thats emitted when an stable token total supply rebalanced.

TransferTreasury(address).notice: An event thats emitted when an Treasury contract transfered.

changeStableTokenOwner(address).notice: Change owner of Stable token contract.

changeTreasury(address).notice: Transfer Treasury contract to new address.

maxSize().notice: The number of depositaries in agregate.

pauser().notice: Address that can pause a contract.

rebalance().notice: Rebalance stable token total supply by depositary balance. Mint stable token if depositary balance greater token total supply and burn otherwise.
